Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW005 use the Storage and location permission Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW005 use the bluetooth and location permission OK LW005 requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW005 cannot be used normally. Turn on Location permission After that, LW005 could search and connect with the device Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW005 use the Location permission LW005 requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW005 cannot be used normally. LW005 requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW005 cannot be used normally.
